author: bundocka
body:
Add filter to select only unprefireable events using trigger rules.

- Added EventFilter/L1TRawToDigi/plugins/TriggerRulePrefireVetoFilter.cc
- Added EventFilter/L1TRawToDigi/python/triggerRulePrefireVetoFilter_cfi.py
- Added PrefireVetoFilter to customiseL1Ntuple
title: Add trigger rule prefire veto filter to L1Ntuple AODRAWEMU workflow
